metadata.name: #Archygif .000001
metadata.description:
Yoga Bangkok 2020

The Archygif series arose out of my desire to bridge the gap between the often contradictory visual worlds in which I inhabit , that of formal static Architectural photography and more candid fast moving ‘gonzo’ environments .

The Archygif was first created in India in 2018 and inspired by the Indian concept of Jugaad , mechanical and technological non-conventional, frugal innovation, often termed a "hack". 

An Archygif is a simple stop motion scene that captures both the formal and informal nature of architectural environments 

The series is on going
